channel.title: Terbiium Gaming [XBOX] need someone who can record
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZuChjiL.png[/img] Hello everyone, I made a youtube channel. I'm a decent trickshotter and player. Problem is, I don't have a PVR or anything to record with. If anyone is willing to record for the channel please tell me.
the games we will be playing are these:
BF2 & 3 Mw2 MW3 (not blackops, I hate black ops) and some other games whenever we want to upload something good.
now if you want to join the (clan) I guess then add me on xbox:[b][u][size=24pt] x Terbiium[/size][/u][/b] I will see how you play and stuff, but if you can record then you're automatically in
Members: NONE PLEASE ADD ME
chanel: youtube.com/terbiiumgaming[/center]

item.title: Terbiium Gaming [XBOX] need someone who can record
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:7, topic:521966”]What’s your clan on mw3 like (lvl)?. I’m at a 1.665 kdr +, I’m pretty good but my accuracy has been a bit shit lately compared to what it used to be like.
fringie2 is my g’tag[/quote]
I was helping my little cousin boost and he didn’t turn his theater off on faceoff, so I got reset so mw3 is bad.

Read full topic
